title: Implement Local iMessage Analytics WebUI
description: Execute the PLAN.md architecture for a localhost-first iMessage analytics app with equal support for macOS live data and iMazing imports.
acceptance_criteria: All v1 phases are delivered and tracked as child issues; unified canonical model, API surface, and privacy controls are in place.
notes:
Phase 1 delivered in codebase: server/web/shared workspaces, canonical SQLite model, macOS live sync endpoint, iMazing CSV/TXT import endpoints with warning model, people/conversation/timeline/insights/imports/reports/settings UI surfaces, parser tests, and build/typecheck/test pass.
Added Bun migration feature imsg-gui-xm5.6 with child tasks for script/runtime migration, DB abstraction, bun:sqlite parity, cutover/removal of better-sqlite3, and regression validation. Phase 2/3/QA are now gated on this migration.
Completed Bun migration feature imsg-gui-xm5.6: PLAN/Beads updated, Bun scripts/runtime adopted, DB abstractions added, bun:sqlite cutover completed, better-sqlite3 removed from deps/import usage, and regression gates (typecheck/test/build/API smoke) passed.

title: Phase 4: Report exports and production hardening
description: Implement PDF/CSV report export endpoints, optimize performance for large datasets, and finalize packaging/setup docs.
acceptance_criteria: User can generate report artifacts from UI/API and app remains responsive on large histories.

title: Show visible sync/import status in Imports UI
description: Expose sync and import mutation progress/results/errors in the Imports panel so users can see when operations succeed with zero/new rows.
acceptance_criteria: Imports view displays pending/success/error states and sync batch totals.
close_reason: Added explicit sync/import progress, error, and completion summaries in Imports view, including multi-batch sync totals and range tip.

title: Phase 2: TXT import, parse confidence, and identity merge
description: Add iMazing TXT parser with fallback states, parse warning pipeline, confidence scoring, identity auto-linking, and manual merge review UI.
acceptance_criteria: TXT imports succeed with surfaced parse warnings; user can approve/reject identity merges and see updated metrics.

title: Phase 3: Codex OAuth NLP jobs and privacy controls
description: Implement Codex OAuth PKCE, Keychain token storage, explicit-slice GPT analysis jobs, consent UX, and NLP audit log.
acceptance_criteria: NLP jobs only run for user-selected slices and create attributed insights with confidence + audit record.

title: Phase 1: Core Platform (schema, ingestion, people dashboard)
description: Deliver monorepo scaffold, canonical SQLite schema, macOS adapter, iMazing CSV ingestion, baseline people-first dashboard, and rule-based core metrics.
acceptance_criteria: macOS sync + CSV import populate canonical tables and power people dashboard with 12-month default range.
close_reason: Monorepo scaffold, canonical schema, macOS sync adapter, iMazing CSV ingestion, people-first dashboard baseline, and rule-based metrics delivered.

title: Cross-phase QA: fixtures, parser tests, analytics snapshots, Playwright
description: Implement and maintain validation suite across parsers, metrics, NLP boundaries, and UI flows defined in PLAN.md acceptance criteria.
acceptance_criteria: Automated tests cover CSV/TXT parsing edge cases, identity merge behavior, analytics regressions, NLP slice boundaries, and privacy defaults.

title: Bun Runtime + SQLite Migration
description: Migrate package manager/scripts/runtime to Bun and refactor DB access from better-sqlite3 to bun:sqlite with zero-regression gating.
acceptance_criteria: Bun is canonical runtime/package manager, better-sqlite3 removed, and regression suite passes with unchanged /api/v1 behavior.
close_reason: Bun migration and sqlite cutover completed with passing validation gates.

title: Cut over server to Bun runtime + remove better-sqlite3
description: Set bun:sqlite as default runtime adapter, migrate macOS read-only DB path, and remove better-sqlite3 deps/usages.
acceptance_criteria: No better-sqlite3 imports or dependencies remain; server runs with Bun runtime.
close_reason: Cut over to bun:sqlite runtime path and removed better-sqlite3 from dependencies/import usage.

title: Introduce DB adapter abstraction
description: Add DatabaseClient/PreparedStatement/DbTransaction interfaces and refactor server services to consume abstraction rather than driver-specific types.
acceptance_criteria: All DB services compile against shared DB adapter interfaces.
close_reason: Introduced DB adapter interfaces and refactored DB services to consume adapter contract types.

title: Add bun:sqlite adapter + parity tests
description: Implement bun:sqlite adapter and parity tests for schema, CRUD, and transaction semantics.
acceptance_criteria: Parity tests pass and show matching behavior for critical DB operations.
close_reason: Implemented bun:sqlite adapter and parity/stability tests; parity scenario executed successfully.

title: Migrate workspace scripts/install to Bun
description: Switch root and workspace scripts to Bun commands, generate bun.lock, and make Bun the canonical package manager.
acceptance_criteria: bun install/dev/build/test/typecheck work from root with workspace filtering.
close_reason: Root/workspace scripts migrated to Bun; bun.lock generated; npm lockfile removed from source of truth.

title: Docs + regression validation
description: Update README/PLAN with Bun-first workflow and run zero-regression validation across typecheck, tests, build, and API smoke checks.
acceptance_criteria: Documentation is Bun-first and regression checks pass with recorded outcomes.
close_reason: Updated PLAN/README for Bun-first workflow and completed zero-regression validation gates and API smoke checks.
